dialogues.speaker: Protagonist
dialogues.text: Welcome to the world of Elyria, a land of magic and wonder.

dialogues.speaker: Guardian
dialogues.text: Halt! What business do you have in these lands?

dialogues.speaker: Protagonist
dialogues.text: I mean no harm, good sir. I am but a traveler seeking knowledge and adventure.

dialogues.speaker: Guardian
dialogues.text: Your words are smooth, young one. But what of your intentions? Are you prepared to face the dangers that lie within these lands?

dialogues.speaker: Protagonist
dialogues.text: I am not afraid of danger. I have come too far to turn back now.
